Summary: It was as bright as as star.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Santa Ana
There were no other sightings in Santa Ana on or around February 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on Newport Ave and was looking toward 17th and noticed a very low star like object, it was really bright. It wasn't a star. I watched it for about 15 minutes. It was there till I got to my destination. When I got into my car around 10:00pm it was gone. Planes were flying around it like nothing was happening. It was just sitting there motionless This is the second time I have seen this thing. I want an explanation in what is going on. Is it a test aircraft or somthing else. Tomorrow I will get my cam corder ready in case I see this thing again. It was not a sattlelite Please help. Now I want to get into investigating these objects.
